ERRORS.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: There was an error, please contact Administrator
ERRORS.UNAUTHORIZED: User does not have access. Please login again!
ERRORS.BAD_REQUEST: An error occurred, please contact Administrator
ERRORS.NOT_FOUND: The API related to the request could not be found!
ERRORS.ACCESS_DENIED: User has expired. Please login again!
ERRORS.DATA_NOT_UUID_VALUE: There is a problem with the system, please come back later!
ERRORS.PROVISIONAL_HEADERS_ARE_SHOWN: The system is having server connection problems. Please come back later!
ERRORS.CODE_INVALID: Registration confirmation code does not exist!
ERRORS.WRONG_CREDENTIALS_PROVIDED: Email verification or password is incorrect. Please try again!
